content: 2020 i designed this adorable little wrist wallet to be worn when you don t feel like carrying a purse if you are a mom like me you start feeling like a pack mule after you load up on all the stuff you have to carry i have often wished i had something just like this when shopping or going out on a date this would also be great to wear when you do market fairs **the best part about this project is it is worked seamlessly with only 2 ends to weave in no sewing ** supplies needed - 50-75 yds of cotton/cotton blend dk yarn size 3 such as lion brand comfy cotton blend or lion brand coboo if you choose to use coboo you may need to go up a hook size or crochet more loosely note you could also use acrylic yarn but it will stretch quite a bit - crochet hook size f 3 75 mm or size needed to obtain gauge - 8-10 mm beads of your choice 25 beads for the original design 30 beads for the finger loop design note the beads must have rather large holes to fit onto your strand of yarn - scissors measuring tape and yarn needle terminology and abbreviations used pattern is written in us terminology back loop only - blo chain s - chain s decrease - decrease fasten_off - fo front loop only - flo place bead - pb single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch stitch es - st s special stitches picot chain 3 single_crochet in the 3rd chain from your hook place bead bring bead to abut your hook complete st as normal gauge chain 12 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each st across 11 single_crochet row 2-11 chain 1 turn place 1 single_crochet in each st across 11 single_crochet finished swatch should measure 2 x 2 finished measurements open pocket should measure approximately 5 5 14 cm from tip of button hole to bottom of pocket in length it is 2 25 6 cm in width note that there is also a youtube video that you can refer to if you need help with the pattern all digital patterns are non-refundable
